title: Jeb：关于刷怪场的看法
author: cyqsimon
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2014-1-24 11:38 编辑 

Jeb: Mob farms are item dupes in my opinion, but I'm not an idiot who ignores a 1500 posts long uproar on reddit, http://www.reddit.com/r/Minecr....../

Jeb：我个人认为刷怪厂是克隆物品的行为（言下之意就是bug），但是我不会傻到连reddit上那1500个回帖的抱怨都不去理会的。


解释一下此次事件的起因：

Mojang计划在最新的快照里做一下更改：

铁傀儡只有在由玩家杀死时会掉落铁
僵尸猪人只有在由玩家杀死时会掉落金（粒/锭）

这个决定导致玩家社区的许多人产生了不满，普遍认为这个改动妨碍了Minecraft后期的自动化可能性，同时也违背了Minecraft作为一款沙盒游戏的主旨。

（Reddit翻译）



*从（Reddit翻译）开始到此，禁止转载！

于是就产生了Jeb上面在Twitter上的回帖。

写完这篇文章，我个人感觉蛮伤感的，好像Mojang正在慢慢剥夺我对Minecraft最初的那份热情。

大家觉得呢？以后的版本里是否应该允许自动刷怪厂呢？

有能力的自己爬墙告诉Mojang，没能力的告诉我，我会有选择性的转告Mojang。

本帖最后由 毒蛇 于 2014-1-21 12:13 编辑 

这是什么意思？复杂啊，算了，我是这个观点：刷怪塔和刷沙机不是一个性质，后者是通过BUG复制方块，前者是通过特性来巧妙的获得物品，当然，mojang这么做有自己的道理，毕竟mojang已经宽容地允许mod、盗版等事物的流行，再不限制原版也就该遭殃了。可是，建一个刷怪塔远远比挖矿杀怪有意思，刷怪塔能证明玩家近入了高科技时代，而杀怪只是停留在血腥时代，真正的生存时代。好比我们社会，为什么要有牧场？不能见到一只猪杀一只吗？当然不行，效率太低。另外，刷铁机是MC中最难搞的工程之一，你得把村民弄上高塔，再设计各种传送装置（我是说defanive），并用岩浆杀死他，你要是人杀，他的血量足以你砍10下的。你以为搭一堆地狱门容易？不可能，辛辛苦苦搭完地狱门，结果没用了，这有意思吗？另外，生存的目标就是变成像现实一样的美好生活，不是像猿人一样的所谓的“美好生活”，能吃上熟肉就得。我们需要发展、进步，这才是最关键的！

replies.author: junyi5353
replies.txt_content: 我个人觉得这样做是正确的，我会自己把内容反馈给Mojang。大家做个参考即可。Minecraft本身就是一个建筑沙盒游戏，红石，铁路等都是为了游戏更丰富而增加的。玩家在这里建造属于自己的楼房、建筑物是一个享受的过程。能够建造出红石电路、高级过山车、刷怪箱的玩家不但自己可以获得一定的成就感，也可以得到别人的赞许。但我玩家不应该通过这样的建筑来获取利益（冒险模式除外）。想象一下，生活就像冒险模式，手是不能撸石头撸树的，你还想在生活中刷怪？恐怕不会。当你获得一个刷怪箱方块时，它没有物品ID也没有生物ID，会自动生成猪。如果你让猪从高空掉下来摔死，得到它的肉。没错，人类就是这样生活的。但是，要真真的体验MC，就要像真正生活一样用心去品味。我原来看到一个过山车存档，当你输入/gamemode 1时，隐藏的testfor命令方块会将你的模式改为生存，这才是真正的好作品。玩一个MC也要作弊，可想你在生活中的心理。作为一个正版用户，作为一个每天关注MCBBS和启动器新闻的开发者和体验者，我非常支持Mojang.我希望他们能把Minecraft开发的更好。

replies.author: weihan1102
replies.txt_content:
我搞不懂为什么 Jeb 会认为这是一个BUG。
刷怪塔和刷黑曜石，透视等不同。
刷黑曜石、透视是通过游戏的BUG来达到的。
但是刷怪塔是用游戏的特性来刷怪的。而不是用游戏的BUG。

Minecraft享受的就是一开始拓荒，砍树，挖石头，挖矿……到后期的制作各种自动化机器，发展自己世界。让自己的世界越来越先进，和人类的发展史有几分相似的！

但是这个限制却让我觉得被Mojang强制限制在了全自动化世界以外。Minecraft作为一个沙盒游戏，是不应该限制玩家的玩法的，如果某玩家喜欢传统的杀怪方式，那么他可以选择不要建造刷怪塔而自己手动去刷怪。

再说，建造刷怪塔也不是件简单的事情，需要大量的资源、技术和知识等。还需要精通Minecraft的特性，不是说几个小时就能建起来的。所以我认为这项修改是不应该的。让我们一起加油反馈给Minecraft吧！

以上纯属个人意见。

replies.author: hyperx
replies.txt_content:
imo jeb has only built up some very vague sense of judgement on the design of the game. He's cool and professional and all that, but not the decision maker sort of guy. If someone has a strong proposal, like dinnerbone, jeb's probably going to buy into that without much sentiment.

dinnerbone, on the other hand, doesn't take things easily and try to go into the very detail of how everything works. Especially Minecraft the Dungeon Crawler RPG. Minecraft's monster fighting experiance is minimal and mostly pressure-free, and dinnerbone wouldn't let that go easily.

But minecraft's raison d'être is that it has a little bit of everything. If mojang honestly think people have fun under minecraft's rules they don't deserve their fame. People have fun *with* minecraft's rules.

"I want gold. how do I get that?" asks the player.

- "go fight monsters, they'll drop it." says a typical RPG. And the player has his fun fighting said monsters.
- "go fight monsters, they'll drop it." says minecraft. And the player has his fun experimenting mob spawning conditions, devising grinding machines, and calculating drop rates.

dinnerbone is not making minecraft. he's playing it, with his hands on the source code rather than on a pickaxe. And he's got some pretty tight play. What the players only get is his leftovers, though.

replies.author: hyperx
replies.txt_content:
发个中文版

我的个人意见是，对于minecraft的设计jeb只有一些很模糊的判断。他很厉害很专业，但他不是做决定的那种人。如果有人（比如dinnerbone）提出一个很好的设计，那么jeb很可能不带多少顾虑就接受了。

而dinnerbone很认真，不会马虎，特别是在minecraft的战斗方面。minecraft的战斗元素非常弱并且简单，dinnerbone不会就此干休的。

但minecraft存在的理由在于它什么机制都有一点。如果mojang真的认为玩家是在minecraft的规则下玩得很开心，那他们有负他们的盛名。玩家是在玩minecraft的规则。

假如一个玩家想要金子，游戏会怎么告诉他？
一个典型的RPG会告诉他，某个怪物会掉落金子，去打他吧。然后玩家通过去打这个怪物来享受游戏。
minecraft也会告诉他，僵尸猪人会掉落金子，去打他吧。但玩家会去研究僵尸猪人的出生规则，设计刷怪场，计算金子掉落数目。他甚至可能会去搭建一个僵尸猪人竞技场，邀请他的朋友来参加，并且制定战斗规则。

设计和实验游戏规则，这才是minecraft的主要玩点。通过mojang源代码来设计、调整游戏机制，dinnerbone其实是在玩游戏，而不只是做游戏。我们玩家拿到的只是dinnerbone玩剩下的，而在这之外已经没有多少设计和实验空间了。这大大降低了minecraft对我们玩家的趣味性。

replies.author: cyqsimon
replies.txt_content:
hyperx 发表于 2014-1-21 21:55 
imo jeb has only built up some very vague sense of judgement on the design of the game. He's cool an ...
I feel like you were ranting instead of giving constructive critisism.

I do not agree with your point about how we are playing dinnerbone's leftovers. Dinnerbone has been one of the lead developer for years now and as far as I think, he did a pretty amazing job, adding so many features into Minecraft that noone has ever thought of, and thus making Minecraft increasingly interesting and popular.

I respect Mojang team's decisions, because I believe they have proved themselves through the prior things they did to Minecraft, which for most part, was just wonderful. Even if you categorize what they are doing now as mistakes, it is also my belief that everyone makes mistakes. Making mistankes does not prevent a game from being awesome.

Getting back to the actual topic, Mojang has been experimenting with different things that the rest of the gaming industry has not even dare to think of. The original concept of minecraft is among one of them. When they started off with those ideas, I believe they hardly had any followers. But then, through this many "risky" steps, we have this awesome game that we see now. This decision to remove drops is one of those "risky" decisions, and I do admit that I am one of those who opposes this change, but I also believe that those decisions are made by rational thinkers who know what they are doing.

So why not try enbrace the future. We can try to carve the path of Minecraft's development, but complaining about how the creators are inconsiderate is not any helpful. Just wait and see. Maybe this new feature will lead us away from what we used to consider as a non-removable “ending” of the game, into something else – something that we have never expected before. It might be more awesome than what we have now.
